title: The bodies of Carol Davidson and daughter found | Ashley King | KSSN 96
text:
The bodies of Carol Davidson and daughter found posted by Ashley King - share 
Very sad news about the missing mother and toddler that I blogged about a few months ago. 
An autopsy report revealed the two bodies found near Siloam Springs over the weekend are Carol Davidson and daughter RoseMarry. 
The cause of death has not yet been revealed. 
35-year-old Carol Davidson and her daughter, RoseMarry were last seen in the area on Saturday, November 12. 
Time-Line of Events: 
The mom and toddler were last seen at the Green Tree RV Park which sits along us 412 on November 12. 
Three days later, a hunter found Davidson's 1999 Dodge Caravan along Lookout Tower Road. 
Saturday, February 18, a body was found near Lookout Tower Rd. 
Sunday, February 19, a second body was located by authorities in the same vicinity. Contact
